5959 Antenatal care
6
Your midwife or doctor should:
• review, discuss and record the results of any 
screening tests from the last appointment;
• use a tape or undertake an ultrasound scan 
to measure the size of your uterus and plot on 
your individual growth chart;
• measure your blood pressure and test your 
urine for protein;
